Name: kamer
About the game: A game about daydreaming. Kamer is a short game about being home. It's a relaxing experience of about 10 to 20 minutes. Walk around a room, interact with some objects, and let your thoughts flow... Controls arrow keys/left stick to move X to grab F4 to toggle fullscreen Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks!
